title: two pulsefire ezreal
body:
i got two pulsefire ezreals skins can i have dj sona or give it to someone riot ty
(also how do i insert an image)

replies.body: :/ and i'm on my 11 champ streak shards from chest .... God

Hey suhbee,

Are you referring to shards that you receiving in Loot? If so, we aren't able to modify content, so we wouldn't be able to swap out one of your Pulsefire Ezreal shards to a DJ Sona shard.
upload it to imgur, and paste the link
